fields.Description/Abstract:
The INE Survey was developed in 2004 and revised in 2006, 2009, and 2010. The INE is a mixed method instrument that provides a stable structure of items reliably answered by survey participants. Students and faculty complete the same survey to measure both groups’ perceptions of faculty and student incivility. The INE has been used in several empirical studies and has been translated into Hebrew, Farsi, Mandarin Chinese, and Indonesian. International studies using the INE are underway in the following universities:
Universitas Pelita School of Nursing, Harapan, Indonesia
Hangzhou University College of Nursing, Hangzhou, People’s Republic of China
Emek Yezreel College, Emek Izrael, Israel
Golestan University of Medical Sciences, Gorgan, Iran
Isra University, Amman, Jordan
